strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Still trying to figure out your weekend plans? We've got you covered:

  • In the dark: Crystal Bridges is hosting Art Trail at Night tonight from 8-11p where you can enjoy making your own art and listening to some live music.
  • Saucy: Railyard Live has some great music coming to the Butterfield Stage this weekend with Arkansauce tonight and Interstellar Overdrive tomorrow.
  • Tradition: Check out the Decatur BBQ this Sunday. There will be a 5K, a car show, a parade and live music from Blane Howard.
  • First Friday: You know what that means. It's time for some fun in downtown Bentonville. There will be live music, back-to-school fun, and even a Twinkie eating competition.
  • Tax free: Don't forget that this weekend is Tax Free Weekend in Arkansas!
  • A classic: Tontitown Grape Festival is kicked off its 123rd year this week and has a weekend full of fun in the lineup.
  • Get going: Women of OZ is hosting its flagship MTB ride this weekend. There is a route for everyone on this ride, so both experienced and new riders can feel included.
  • Hey batter: Enjoy a Sunday with the kids at Arvest Ballpark. Kids eat free and can run the bases as the Naturals square off with the Drillers.

Have fun, stay safe, and we'll see you next week!
